oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-01-16 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on January 16, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Cimarron Kids; Dick Reinhart; Oklahoma Songbirds; Jack Beasley; Ann Bond
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Allan Page announces the show’s credits / (0:27) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (0:37) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "The Little Red Schoolhouse" / (1:42) The Cimarron Kids perform "Ridin’" / (3:44) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (4:05) Dick Reinhart performs "Bury Me There On The Wasteland" / (6:51) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "Chuck Wagon Bill" [unconfirmed] / (8:50) Hiram Higsby and Jack Beasley introduce the next song / (9:05) Jack Beasley performs "Have I Told You Lately That I Love You" / (11:22) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (12:07) Ann Bond performs "Down The Trail In San Antone" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Reinhart, Dick; Beasley, Jack; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
